howFar: How far out are we planning for?
chartDescription: We set up the following plan for the next 12 months based on your previous history, catalog, and connected channels. Feel free to play with the forecast till it feels right.

growth.topModelText: We will focus at the top of the funnel, which feels risky, but results in higher quality customers
growth.middleModelText: We will focus an equal amount on all parts of the funnel
growth.bottomModelText: We’ll maximize spend on the customers you already have

moderate.topText: focuses on brand awareness, generating interest, and educating first time visitors
moderate.middleText: speak directly to potential customers who are evaluating your brand and products
moderate.bottomText: new and returning customers make purchases
